questionTitle: ___, The Yearling, won a Pulitzer Prize.
anwers: Her best work was Marjorie Rawlings'

questionTitle: The business has lost a lot of orders recently and is going through a ___ time.
If you want to grow as a business and attract new customers you must ___ with the times.
It is now believed that some damage to tissues may result ________ them to frequent X-rays.
Many plants can grow in water, without any soil, ________ nutrients are added.
Modern industrial methods have supplanted individual crafts, ________ stone carvers, coopers, and cobblers virtually extinct.
A seventeen-year-old is not ________ to vote in an election.
When a woman becomes pregnant ________ in life, she encounters additional risks in delivering a healthy baby.
________ Giant Ape Man, our biggest and probably one of our first human ancestors, was just about the size of a male gorilla.
Because the United States does not have much oil any more, imported oil ________ used more and more.
________ actress's life is in many ways unlike that of other women.
Trapeze artists usually rely on safety nets ________ through the air.
Business partners can usually sell their mutually owned property without consulting ________ unless they have agreed to a separate contract.
Our flight from Amsterdam to London was delyed ________ the heavy fog.
One of ________ of the late Middle Ages was Saint Thomas Aquinas, a scholar who studied under Albertus Magnus.
Almost everyone fails ________ on the first try.
anwers: to have passed his driver's test

questionTitle: The fact that space exploration has increased dramatically in the past thirty years ________.
anwers: is an evidence of us wanting to know more of our solar system
indicates that we are very eager to learn all we can about our solar system
how we want to learn more about the solar system
is pointing to evidence of our intention to know a lot more about what is called our solar system

questionTitle: If it ________ more humid in the desert South west the hot temperatures would be unbearable.
Employers often require that candidates have not only a degree in engineering ________.
In order for people who spoke different languages to engage in trade ________ , they often developed a simplified language called "pidgin".
